fields.display_name: Sum of current tax assesment - Total
fields.display_text: The sum of all matching tax assessment records. A project can have multiple tax records due to matching multiple MAR IDs or SSLs

fields.display_name: Sum of current tax assesment - Land
fields.display_text: The sum of all matching tax assessment records, land assessment value only. A project can have multiple tax records due to matching multiple MAR IDs or SSLs

fields.display_name: Sum of current tax assesment - Improvements
fields.display_text: The sum of all matching tax assessment records, improvements value only. A project can have multiple tax records due to matching multiple MAR IDs or SSLs
